CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Lerasium
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.label: lerasium
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.description: Lerasium is an exceptionally rare god metal tied to the Shard Preservation. When ingested, it transforms the user into a Mistborn, granting access to all Allomantic powers.
